attributes.title: Awful & Waste of time
attributes.review: The app is very glitchy and takes to long to load. Also It’s hard to find messages on the app and I am constantly kicked off the app.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review:
this app is awful. as soon as i downloaded it my phone started nonstop glitching no matter what app i was on. when i try to get on this app in specific my phone crashes several times. this software needs extremely updated before anymore can use it. this app leads to viruses that can ruin your phone forever. not to mention this app supports an awful human being.
obama2020

attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: This app is very glitchy and won’t stay open for more than 5 seconds without closing! This is a huuuuuge problem and for this reason I was forced to uninstall the app 😪

attributes.title: Worst app 😽✨🧚‍♂️
attributes.review:
[Verse]
I was a girl in the village doing alright
Then I became a princess overnight

Making my way, it's an adventure every day (Sofia)

To show them all that I'm Sofia the First

attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP
attributes.review: President trump tried to TEXT A MINOR! My daughter downloaded this app to learn about the president’s plans for this upcoming election as she is now able to vote in November BUT she is still 17. The first thing the app did was ask for her number for “updates*” from Trump. EXCUSE ME?!?! STAY AWAY FROM MY CHILD!!!! 😤😤🤬🤧🤧DISGUSTING APP

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: This is quite literally the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. The second I opened the app I was flooded with thinly veiled racist news articles and horrible ideas. Plus the whole red, white, and blue color scheme was ugly and overdone. 🧚‍♀️✨Try harder🧚‍♀️✨ jk stop trying please❤️

attributes.title: BAD APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting it to be easy to use but it is NOT. I can’t find anything and sometimes it will make me click on something without me even touching it. Just don’t get this app

attributes.title: AWFUL DISGUSTING TERRIBLE
attributes.review:
I cannot even begin to describe how awful this app is. WHY DOES IT EVEN EXIST TO BEGIN WITH. IT’S FLAWED. I’d rather spend my time on twitter arguing with Karen. This app needs to be deleted immediately. It is disgusting. How could they even let this app be on the app store???? TERRIBLE. 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢 
anyways DON’T vote for trump🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Worst App out There
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to learn more about how I could support our great president. Then I realized he was a slimy racist, sexist liar and immediately threw my phone into the garbage because I had ever opened the app. Never again. 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Never again 💩
attributes.review: This app has hacked my whole phone with racist antisemetic homophobic and sexist adds. This dumb oompalumoa of a president shouldn’t even be on this earth much less have a app. Strong advise, save urself from trump when u still can.
